name: Music_1742.wav
keywords: ['heavy metal', 'no voices', 'distortion guitars', 'palm muted arpeggios', 'powerful percussion', 'keyboards']
caption: This heavy metal song features distortion guitars. One guitar plays power chords. Another guitar is playing a repetitive riff using palm muted arpeggiated notes. The keyboard plays chords in the background. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. The percussion plays a simple beat in common time. It starts off playing the kick and crash followed by three beats on the kick and ride. After four bars, a rock drum roll is played. This song can be played in a superhero movie.
